law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, in Dorchester County, a new license may not be...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, in Dorchester County, a new license may not be granted to sell any alcoholic beverage in a building with a wall within 300 feet in a direct line of the nearest point of the main building of a public or nonpublic kindergarten, elementary, or secondary school, or church or other place of worship.

Subsection (a) of this section does not apply to:
The granting of a license for a premises located within the restricted distance if a license to sell alcoholic beverages on the premises existed as of October 1, 1996;
An application for a Class B (on-sale) beer, wine and liquor license for a premises in Cambridge or Secretary; or
A premises issued a special or temporary license.
